---
title: "tariff_visualization"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
export_tariff<-read.csv("export_tariff_final.csv")
```

```{r}
export_tariff<-export_tariff%>%
  mutate(hs4= ifelse(nchar(hs4)==3,paste("0",hs4,sep="") ,hs4))
```

```{r}
export_tariff<-export_tariff%>%
  arrange(desc(effective_tariff))%>%
  mutate(perc_tariff= effective_tariff*100)%>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(Date))
```

```{r}
export_tariff%>%
  filter(hs4 =="0101")

export_tariff%>%
  filter(hs4 =="0101")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = perc_tariff))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()
```
